mdRecord.dcterms:title: 8th January party: The pleasure of your company is respectfully solicited at a quadrille party to be given at Monticello House, Charlottesville, Va., on Thursday Jan. 8, at half past 7 o'clock, P.M.
Pleasure of your company is respectfully solicited at a quadrille party
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 14 x 20 cm. folded to 14 x 9 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Managers: G.L. Gordon, J.F. Steele, T.M. Matthews, R. Bolling, W.C. Randolph, L.E. Polk, A.S. Brown, M.W.D. Hogshead, T.R. Jones, T. Saunders, R.A. Caskie, F. Marbury."
Text within border of embossed leaves. Text printed on p. [1] only; p. [2]-[4] are blank.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia.
Balls (Parties)--Virginia--Charlottesville.
Dance parties--Virginia--Charlottesville.
